19namespace OT {

22/*
23 * glyf -- TrueType Glyph Data
24 * https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/glyf
25 */
26#define HB_OT_TAG_glyf HB_TAG('g','l','y','f')
27
28struct glyf
29{
30 friend struct glyf_accelerator_t;
31
32 static constexpr hb_tag_t tableTag = HB_OT_TAG_glyf;
33
34 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c HB_UNUSED) const
35 {
36 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
37 /* Runtime checks as eager sanitizing each glyph is costy */
38 return_trace (true);
39 }
40
41 /* requires source of SubsetGlyph complains the identifier isn't declared */
42 template <typename Iterator>
43 bool serialize (hb_serialize_context_t *c,
44 Iterator it,
45 bool use_short_loca,
46 const hb_subset_plan_t *plan)
47 {
48 TRACE_SERIALIZE (this);
49
50 unsigned init_len = c->length ();
51 for (auto &_ : it)
52 if (unlikely (!_.serialize (c, use_short_loca, plan)))
53 return false;
54
55 /* As a special case when all glyph in the font are empty, add a zero byte
56 * to the table, so that OTS doesnâ€™t reject it, and to make the table work
57 * on Windows as well.
58 * See https://github.com/khaledhosny/ots/issues/52 */
59 if (init_len == c->length ())
60 {
61 HBUINT8 empty_byte;
62 empty_byte = 0;
63 c->copy (src: empty_byte);
64 }
65 return_trace (true);
66 }
67
68 /* Byte region(s) per glyph to output
69 unpadded, hints removed if so requested
70 If we fail to process a glyph we produce an empty (0-length) glyph */
71 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
72 {
73 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
74
75 glyf *glyf_prime = c->serializer->start_embed <glyf> ();
76 if (unlikely (!c->serializer->check_success (glyf_prime))) return_trace (false);
77
78 hb_font_t *font = nullptr;
79 if (c->plan->normalized_coords)
80 {
81 font = _create_font_for_instancing (plan: c->plan);
82 if (unlikely (!font)) return false;
83 }
84
85 hb_vector_t<unsigned> padded_offsets;
86 unsigned num_glyphs = c->plan->num_output_glyphs ();
87 if (unlikely (!padded_offsets.resize (num_glyphs)))
88 return false;
89
90 hb_vector_t<glyf_impl::SubsetGlyph> glyphs;
91 if (!_populate_subset_glyphs (plan: c->plan, font, glyphs))
92 return false;
93
94 if (font)
95 hb_font_destroy (font);
96
97 unsigned max_offset = 0;
98 for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_glyphs; i++)
99 {
100 padded_offsets[i] = glyphs[i].padded_size ();
101 max_offset += padded_offsets[i];
102 }
103
104 bool use_short_loca = false;
105 if (likely (!c->plan->force_long_loca))
106 use_short_loca = max_offset < 0x1FFFF;
107
108 if (!use_short_loca) {
109 for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_glyphs; i++)
110 padded_offsets[i] = glyphs[i].length ();
111 }
112
113 bool result = glyf_prime->serialize (c: c->serializer, it: glyphs.writer (), use_short_loca, plan: c->plan);
114 if (c->plan->normalized_coords && !c->plan->pinned_at_default)
115 _free_compiled_subset_glyphs (glyphs, index: glyphs.length - 1);
116
117 if (!result) return false;
118
119 if (unlikely (c->serializer->in_error ())) return_trace (false);
120
121 return_trace (c->serializer->check_success (glyf_impl::_add_loca_and_head (c->plan,
122 padded_offsets.iter (),
123 use_short_loca)));
124 }
125
126 bool
127 _populate_subset_glyphs (const hb_subset_plan_t *plan,
128 hb_font_t *font,
129 hb_vector_t<glyf_impl::SubsetGlyph> &glyphs /* OUT */) const;
130
131 hb_font_t *
132 _create_font_for_instancing (const hb_subset_plan_t *plan) const;
133
134 void _free_compiled_subset_glyphs (hb_vector_t<glyf_impl::SubsetGlyph> &glyphs, unsigned index) const
135 {
136 for (unsigned i = 0; i <= index && i < glyphs.length; i++)
137 glyphs[i].free_compiled_bytes ();
138 }
139
140 protected:
141 UnsizedArrayOf<HBUINT8>
142 dataZ; /* Glyphs data. */
143 public:
144 DEFINE_SIZE_MIN (0); /* In reality, this is UNBOUNDED() type; but since we always
145 * check the size externally, allow Null() object of it by
146 * defining it _MIN instead. */
147};
148
149struct glyf_accelerator_t
150{
151 glyf_accelerator_t (hb_face_t *face)
152 {
153 short_offset = false;
154 num_glyphs = 0;
155 loca_table = nullptr;
156 glyf_table = nullptr;
157#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
158 gvar = nullptr;
159#endif
160 hmtx = nullptr;
161#ifndef HB_NO_VERTICAL
162 vmtx = nullptr;
163#endif
164 const OT::head &head = *face->table.head;
165 if (head.indexToLocFormat > 1 || head.glyphDataFormat > 0)
166 /* Unknown format. Leave num_glyphs=0, that takes care of disabling us. */
167 return;
168 short_offset = 0 == head.indexToLocFormat;
169
170 loca_table = face->table.loca.get_blob (); // Needs no destruct!
171 glyf_table = hb_sanitize_context_t ().reference_table<glyf> (face);
172#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
173 gvar = face->table.gvar;
174#endif
175 hmtx = face->table.hmtx;
176#ifndef HB_NO_VERTICAL
177 vmtx = face->table.vmtx;
178#endif
179
180 num_glyphs = hb_max (1u, loca_table.get_length () / (short_offset ? 2 : 4)) - 1;
181 num_glyphs = hb_min (num_glyphs, face->get_num_glyphs ());
182 }
183 ~glyf_accelerator_t ()
184 {
185 glyf_table.destroy ();
186 }
187
188 bool has_data () const { return num_glyphs; }
189
190 protected:
191 template<typename T>
192 bool get_points (hb_font_t *font, hb_codepoint_t gid, T consumer) const
193 {
194 if (gid >= num_glyphs) return false;
195
196 /* Making this allocfree is not that easy
197 https://github.com/harfbuzz/harfbuzz/issues/2095
198 mostly because of gvar handling in VF fonts,
199 perhaps a separate path for non-VF fonts can be considered */
200 contour_point_vector_t all_points;
201
202 bool phantom_only = !consumer.is_consuming_contour_points ();
203 if (unlikely (!glyph_for_gid (gid).get_points (font, *this, all_points, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, true, true, phantom_only)))
204 return false;
205
206 if (consumer.is_consuming_contour_points ())
207 {
208 unsigned count = all_points.length;
209 assert (count >= glyf_impl::PHANTOM_COUNT);
210 count -= glyf_impl::PHANTOM_COUNT;
211 for (unsigned point_index = 0; point_index < count; point_index++)
212 consumer.consume_point (all_points[point_index]);
213 consumer.points_end ();
214 }
215
216 /* Where to write phantoms, nullptr if not requested */
217 contour_point_t *phantoms = consumer.get_phantoms_sink ();
218 if (phantoms)
219 for (unsigned i = 0; i < glyf_impl::PHANTOM_COUNT; ++i)
220 phantoms[i] = all_points[all_points.length - glyf_impl::PHANTOM_COUNT + i];
221
222 return true;
223 }
224
225#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
226 struct points_aggregator_t
227 {
228 hb_font_t *font;
229 hb_glyph_extents_t *extents;
230 contour_point_t *phantoms;
231 bool scaled;
232
233 struct contour_bounds_t
234 {
235 contour_bounds_t () { min_x = min_y = FLT_MAX; max_x = max_y = -FLT_MAX; }
236
237 void add (const contour_point_t &p)
238 {
239 min_x = hb_min (min_x, p.x);
240 min_y = hb_min (min_y, p.y);
241 max_x = hb_max (max_x, p.x);
242 max_y = hb_max (max_y, p.y);
243 }
244
245 bool empty () const { return (min_x >= max_x) || (min_y >= max_y); }
246
247 void get_extents (hb_font_t *font, hb_glyph_extents_t *extents, bool scaled)
248 {
249 if (unlikely (empty ()))
250 {
251 extents->width = 0;
252 extents->x_bearing = 0;
253 extents->height = 0;
254 extents->y_bearing = 0;
255 return;
256 }
257 {
258 extents->x_bearing = roundf (min_x);
259 extents->width = roundf (max_x - extents->x_bearing);
260 extents->y_bearing = roundf (max_y);
261 extents->height = roundf (min_y - extents->y_bearing);
262
263 if (scaled)
264 font->scale_glyph_extents (extents);
265 }
266 }
267
268 protected:
269 float min_x, min_y, max_x, max_y;
270 } bounds;
271
272 points_aggregator_t (hb_font_t *font_, hb_glyph_extents_t *extents_, contour_point_t *phantoms_, bool scaled_)
273 {
274 font = font_;
275 extents = extents_;
276 phantoms = phantoms_;
277 scaled = scaled_;
278 if (extents) bounds = contour_bounds_t ();
279 }
280
281 void consume_point (const contour_point_t &point) { bounds.add (p: point); }
282 void points_end () { bounds.get_extents (font, extents, scaled); }
283
284 bool is_consuming_contour_points () { return extents; }
285 contour_point_t *get_phantoms_sink () { return phantoms; }
286 };
287
288 public:
289 unsigned
290 get_advance_with_var_unscaled (hb_font_t *font, hb_codepoint_t gid, bool is_vertical) const
291 {
292 if (unlikely (gid >= num_glyphs)) return 0;
293
294 bool success = false;
295
296 contour_point_t phantoms[glyf_impl::PHANTOM_COUNT];
297 if (font->num_coords)
298 success = get_points (font, gid, consumer: points_aggregator_t (font, nullptr, phantoms, false));
299
300 if (unlikely (!success))
301 return
302#ifndef HB_NO_VERTICAL
303 is_vertical ? vmtx->get_advance_without_var_unscaled (glyph: gid) :
304#endif
305 hmtx->get_advance_without_var_unscaled (glyph: gid);
306
307 float result = is_vertical
308 ? phantoms[glyf_impl::PHANTOM_TOP].y - phantoms[glyf_impl::PHANTOM_BOTTOM].y
309 : phantoms[glyf_impl::PHANTOM_RIGHT].x - phantoms[glyf_impl::PHANTOM_LEFT].x;
310 return hb_clamp (roundf (result), 0.f, (float) UINT_MAX / 2);
311 }
312
313 bool get_leading_bearing_with_var_unscaled (hb_font_t *font, hb_codepoint_t gid, bool is_vertical, int *lsb) const
314 {
315 if (unlikely (gid >= num_glyphs)) return false;
316
317 hb_glyph_extents_t extents;
318
319 contour_point_t phantoms[glyf_impl::PHANTOM_COUNT];
320 if (unlikely (!get_points (font, gid, points_aggregator_t (font, &extents, phantoms, false))))
321 return false;
322
323 *lsb = is_vertical
324 ? roundf (phantoms[glyf_impl::PHANTOM_TOP].y) - extents.y_bearing
325 : roundf (phantoms[glyf_impl::PHANTOM_LEFT].x);
326 return true;
327 }
328#endif
329
330 public:
331 bool get_extents (hb_font_t *font, hb_codepoint_t gid, hb_glyph_extents_t *extents) const
332 {
333 if (unlikely (gid >= num_glyphs)) return false;
334
335#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
336 if (font->num_coords)
337 return get_points (font, gid, consumer: points_aggregator_t (font, extents, nullptr, true));
338#endif
339 return glyph_for_gid (gid).get_extents_without_var_scaled (font, glyf_accelerator: *this, extents);
340 }
341
342 bool paint_glyph (hb_font_t *font, hb_codepoint_t gid, hb_paint_funcs_t *funcs, void *data, hb_color_t foreground) const
343 {
344 funcs->push_clip_glyph (paint_data: data, glyph: gid, font);
345 funcs->color (paint_data: data, is_foreground: true, color: foreground);
346 funcs->pop_clip (paint_data: data);
347
348 return true;
349 }
350
351 const glyf_impl::Glyph
352 glyph_for_gid (hb_codepoint_t gid, bool needs_padding_removal = false) const
353 {
354 if (unlikely (gid >= num_glyphs)) return glyf_impl::Glyph ();
355
356 unsigned int start_offset, end_offset;
357
358 if (short_offset)
359 {
360 const HBUINT16 *offsets = (const HBUINT16 *) loca_table->dataZ.arrayZ;
361 start_offset = 2 * offsets[gid];
362 end_offset = 2 * offsets[gid + 1];
363 }
364 else
365 {
366 const HBUINT32 *offsets = (const HBUINT32 *) loca_table->dataZ.arrayZ;
367 start_offset = offsets[gid];
368 end_offset = offsets[gid + 1];
369 }
370
371 if (unlikely (start_offset > end_offset || end_offset > glyf_table.get_length ()))
372 return glyf_impl::Glyph ();
373
374 glyf_impl::Glyph glyph (hb_bytes_t ((const char *) this->glyf_table + start_offset,
375 end_offset - start_offset), gid);
376 return needs_padding_removal ? glyf_impl::Glyph (glyph.trim_padding (), gid) : glyph;
377 }
378
379 bool
380 get_path (hb_font_t *font, hb_codepoint_t gid, hb_draw_session_t &draw_session) const
381 { return get_points (font, gid, consumer: glyf_impl::path_builder_t (font, draw_session)); }
382
383#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
384 const gvar_accelerator_t *gvar;
385#endif
386 const hmtx_accelerator_t *hmtx;
387#ifndef HB_NO_VERTICAL
388 const vmtx_accelerator_t *vmtx;
389#endif
390
391 private:
392 bool short_offset;
393 unsigned int num_glyphs;
394 hb_blob_ptr_t<loca> loca_table;
395 hb_blob_ptr_t<glyf> glyf_table;
396};
397
398
399inline bool
400glyf::_populate_subset_glyphs (const hb_subset_plan_t *plan,
401 hb_font_t *font,
402 hb_vector_t<glyf_impl::SubsetGlyph>& glyphs /* OUT */) const
403{
404 OT::glyf_accelerator_t glyf (plan->source);
405 unsigned num_glyphs = plan->num_output_glyphs ();
406 if (!glyphs.resize (size_: num_glyphs)) return false;
407
408 unsigned idx = 0;
409 for (auto p : plan->glyph_map->iter ())
410 {
411 unsigned new_gid = p.second;
412 glyf_impl::SubsetGlyph& subset_glyph = glyphs.arrayZ[new_gid];
413 subset_glyph.old_gid = p.first;
414
415 if (unlikely (new_gid == 0 &&
416 !(plan->flags & HB_SUBSET_FLAGS_NOTDEF_OUTLINE)) &&
417 !plan->normalized_coords)
418 subset_glyph.source_glyph = glyf_impl::Glyph ();
419 else
420 {
421 /* If plan has an accelerator, the preprocessing step already trimmed glyphs.
422 * Don't trim them again! */
423 subset_glyph.source_glyph = glyf.glyph_for_gid (gid: subset_glyph.old_gid, needs_padding_removal: !plan->accelerator);
424 }
425
426 if (plan->flags & HB_SUBSET_FLAGS_NO_HINTING)
427 subset_glyph.drop_hints_bytes ();
428 else
429 subset_glyph.dest_start = subset_glyph.source_glyph.get_bytes ();
430
431 if (font)
432 {
433 if (unlikely (!subset_glyph.compile_bytes_with_deltas (plan, font, glyf)))
434 {
435 // when pinned at default, only bounds are updated, thus no need to free
436 if (!plan->pinned_at_default && idx > 0)
437 _free_compiled_subset_glyphs (glyphs, index: idx - 1);
438 return false;
439 }
440 idx++;
441 }
442 }
443 return true;
444}
445
446inline hb_font_t *
447glyf::_create_font_for_instancing (const hb_subset_plan_t *plan) const
448{
449 hb_font_t *font = hb_font_create (face: plan->source);
450 if (unlikely (font == hb_font_get_empty ())) return nullptr;
451
452 hb_vector_t<hb_variation_t> vars;
453 if (unlikely (!vars.alloc (plan->user_axes_location.get_population (), true)))
454 return nullptr;
455
456 for (auto _ : plan->user_axes_location)
457 {
458 hb_variation_t var;
459 var.tag = _.first;
460 var.value = _.second;
461 vars.push (v&: var);
462 }
463
464#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
465 hb_font_set_variations (font, variations: vars.arrayZ, variations_length: plan->user_axes_location.get_population ());
466#endif
467 return font;
468}
469

471} /* namespace OT */

474#endif /* OT_GLYF_GLYF_HH */
